data.lyric:
[ti:Afterglow]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Afterglow]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.52]Afterglow - Ed Sheeran
[00:01.01]Composed by：David Hodges/Ed Sheeran/Fred Gibson
[00:02.65]
[00:03.72]Stop the clocks it's amazing
[00:06.26]
[00:08.37]You should see the way the light dances off your hair
[00:12.47]A million colours of hazel golden and red
[00:16.70]
[00:21.29]Saturday morning is fading
[00:23.78]
[00:25.84]The suns reflected by the coffee in your hand
[00:30.03]My eyes are caught in your gaze all over again
[00:34.32]
[00:37.69]We were love drunk waiting on a miracle
[00:42.09]Trying to find ourselves in the winter snow
[00:46.36]So alone in love like the world had disappeared
[00:51.76]
[00:54.97]Oh I won't be silent and I won't let go
[00:59.30]I will hold on tighter 'til the afterglow
[01:03.64]And we'll burn so bright 'til the darkness softly clears
[01:09.08]
[01:12.27]Oh I will hold on to the afterglow
[01:17.38]
[01:21.00]Oh I will hold on to the afterglow
[01:25.85]
[01:30.86]The weather outside's changing
[01:33.22]
[01:35.19]The leaves are buried under six inches of white
[01:39.46]The radio is playing Iron & Wine
[01:43.81]
[01:48.17]This is a new dimension
[01:50.56]
[01:52.50]This is a level where we're losing track of time
[01:56.72]I'm holding nothing against it except you and I
[02:01.13]
[02:04.34]We were love drunk waiting on a miracle
[02:08.66]Trying to find ourselves in the winter snow
[02:12.83]So alone in love like the world had disappeared
[02:18.25]
[02:21.53]Oh I won't be silent and I won't let go
[02:25.84]I will hold on tighter 'til the afterglow
[02:30.08]And we'll burn so bright 'til the darkness softly clears
[02:35.63]
[02:38.80]Oh I will hold on to the afterglow
[02:43.92]
[02:47.46]Oh I will hold on to the afterglow
[02:52.53]
[02:56.17]Oh I will hold on to the afterglow
data.trans:
[ti:Afterglow]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Afterglow]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.52]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.01]//
[00:02.65]
[00:03.72]时光凝滞 简直不可思议
[00:06.26]
[00:08.37]你应该看看光芒在你发丝间起舞的样子
[00:12.47]色彩斑斓 浅褐色 金色与红色交织在一起
[00:16.70]
[00:21.29]周六的清晨渐渐消逝
[00:23.78]
[00:25.84]阳光倒映在你手中的咖啡里
[00:30.03]你的凝视再一次吸引住我的目光
[00:34.32]
[00:37.69]我们为爱痴醉 等待奇迹降临
[00:42.09]试图在冬雪里寻找自我
[00:46.36]独自沉浸在爱里 仿佛世界已经荡然无存
[00:51.76]
[00:54.97]我不会沉默不语 我不会轻易放手
[00:59.30]我会紧握你的手不放 直到落日余晖
[01:03.64]我们迸发出耀眼的光芒 直到黑暗悄然褪去
[01:09.08]
[01:12.27]我会握着你的手 共赏落日余晖
[01:17.38]
[01:21.00]我会握着你的手 共赏落日余晖
[01:25.85]
[01:30.86]外面的天气骤然突变
[01:33.22]
[01:35.19]树叶被掩埋在六英寸厚的皑皑白雪之下
[01:39.46]广播里传来Iron & Wine的歌声
[01:43.81]
[01:48.17]这是一个崭新的维度 
[01:50.56]
[01:52.50]在这个阶段 我们忘记了时间
[01:56.72]除了你与我之外 我没有一点异议
[02:01.13]
[02:04.34]我们为爱痴醉 等待奇迹降临
[02:08.66]试图在冬雪里寻找自我
[02:12.83]独自沉浸在爱里 仿佛世界已经荡然无存
[02:18.25]
[02:21.53]我不会沉默不语 我不会轻易放手
[02:25.84]我会紧握你的手不放 直到落日余晖
[02:30.08]我们迸发出耀眼的光芒 直到黑暗悄然褪去
[02:35.63]
[02:38.80]我会握着你的手 共赏落日余晖
[02:43.92]
[02:47.46]我会握着你的手 共赏落日余晖
[02:52.53]
[02:56.17]我会握着你的手 共赏落日余晖
